summary: This mod adds the Gray Cowl of Nocturnal as a playable head armor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds the Gray Cowl of Nocturnal as a playable head armor. It is found in the innermost chamber of the Twilight Sepulcher (the room in which you return the Skeleton Key to Nocturnal, and choose a Nightingale skill). THIS MOD WAS NOT CREATED BY ME. it is merely a mesh/texture fix so that the cowl\'s color is correct. The original mod by Nephilim722 can be found here:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15242//?


Please support the original mod as well. :)
author: PharaohArcus
